name: Allison
message: Happy birthday, Jimmy! Hope one day soon you can have all of the McDonalds your stomach can hold, and that you will share with me and Peach-o!

name: Peach
message: Meow... I won't bite the recycling box today... meowbe...

name: Pravin
message: Happy birthday Jimmy! I hope your motorcycle experience has taught you how to drive this Lagann I got you! It is time for you to pierce the heavens.

name: Iris
message: Happy Birthday, Jimmy! I hope it's full of joy and good playtime with Peach, perhaps some mochi ice cream, and most of all, some amusement from my virtual gift via Prof Andrew Hauze's cat, Lionel, who seems to want to give you a fairywren bird, who has found a half of a grapefruit! Whew, that's quite a run-on sentence... anyhow, I hope your 29th is a fantastic, sunny day and that we'll soon be able to celebrate in person, for real!

name: Karl
message: happy birthday jimmy! i hope this picture of me brings you at least a fraction of joy as i would in person. even though youre stuck at home right now, here is a drawing of some chicagos because who has enough money really to buy a real pair these days. well enjoy your birthday year and i hope it brings you lots of great memories! see you soon in one way or another. lets go play some bball next time.

name: Ben
message: Happy birthday Jimmy! Got you a fresh pair of Jordans. That way you can be ballin while you're ballin.

name: Heidy
message: Happy Birthday Jimmy! For some reason Allison mentioned you wanting a Bowser costume, so... here you go.

name: Caroline
message: happy birthday Jimmy! Hope you‚Äôre enjoying Jay Chou‚Äôs songs virtually even if you can‚Äôt go to his concerts in person right now!

name: Paul
message: here‚Äôs the gift on everyone‚Äôs wishlist this year! you may want to wear it when you‚Äôre around your cat, too. HBD jimmy!

name: Alan
message: To many more mother/daughter combos in the years to come!

name: Jeffrey
message:
Hi Jimmy! So sorry that we can't celebrate your birthday in person. Sticking to social distancing norms, I'm sharing my gift through Google hangouts. I noticed that most of the art at the new place is Allison's and I didn't want you to feel left out. That's why I'm giving you a piece of fresh artwork this birthday, drawn by yours truly. It's titled:

Jimmy with Oatmeal
One Jimmy and One Huge Box of Oatmeal!

Hope it's the kind you like üòÖ!

name: Kate
message: Happy Birthday Jimmy! Best wishes for the upcoming year with lots of food, books, comedy, rocks, cat time etc. Hope to celebrate with you soon in person!  Stay safe and well-stocked with essentials.

name: Christine
message: Happy birthday, Jimmy! Ophelia can‚Äôt wait to meet you and wish you the best in person! Hope you don‚Äôt have to spend part of this next year squatting behind a car in record heat in Chicago or visit Texas during 106 degree weather.

name: Yang
message: For Jimmy's b-day, I am bringing him a big non-fiction book. I hope he reads more big books.

name: Steven
message: Happy Birthday Jimmy!! For your birthday, I want to gift you your favorite pasta~ üòâ #healthy I wish I was back in Cambridge and could visit Allison and you on your special day! Will be back soon this summer and can‚Äôt wait to have more hotpot and food adventures with you. Stay flamin!

name: Wendy
message: Hi Jimmy! For this special birthday, Mayu and I are gifting you four more cats! The big one is Jackfruit, and the little ones are Pomelo, Lychee, and Jujube. You could say that it's a fruit basket! Hope you have an amazing, protein-packed birthday and that your 29th year is the best yet!

name: Rathanak
message:
Hi Jimmy!! I hope you enjoy your very first basketball book. It‚Äôs an actual book. I‚Äôm not making it up.

https://www.amazon.com/My-First-Basketball-Book-Sports/dp/1454914874

May your wingspan be long, your hops be high and your reading speed be fast. Happy 29th birthday!
